incident_updates.body: An incident is in progress on our Backbone infrastructure. Please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 17/11/2024 16:58 UTC Service impact : There may be intermittent connectivity issues on Network Services Ovh Cloud Connect. Ongoing actions : Investigating Our provider is fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Please be advised that a further disruption of few seconds occurred at 15:06 UTC. 
Our network team is in communication with the service provider to ensure that their scheduled maintenance is completed ahead of schedule. This will enable us to restore our main link as soon as possible and resolve the issue.

We are still in communication with the provider, for now the situation remains unchanged, there are no further developments. Our connection has been stable since the last flap . 
We will keep you updated.

Ongoing works are in progress from our provider side.
The last flap detected was the 17th of November at 20:07 UTC and lasted 2 minutes. Since then, our link is stable.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Currently, our fiber provider TATA is currently conducting a maintenance on one of the two links connecting our data centers in Mumbai and Singapore which will end on the 18th of November at 23:30 UTC.
Unfortunately, our second link (TATA fail over link) has been flapping for a few seconds every couple of hours. This flapping may result in packet loss when transferring data between Mumbai datacenter to other OVHcloud datacenters.
Our teams are currently in contact with TATA to check if a rollback or workaround can be done to mitigate the impact on our services.

This issue is still in progress. 
Our teams are working closely with the service provider to investigate and implement a solution that will restore the service.

An incident is in progress on our backbone offer. Please be aware that this is currently causing the latency. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 16/11/2024 14:28 UTC Service impact : There may be intermittent connectivity issues between Mumbai and Singapore which may cause latency issues. Ongoing actions : Investigating Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
We have detected an issue on our infrastucture. We will update informations when we will have more details.

Thank you for your understanding.
